00038 #include "LaplacianSmoother.hpp"
00039 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00040 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00041 
00042 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00043 
00044 std::string LaplacianSmoother::get_name() const { return "LaplacianSmoother"; }
00045 
00046 LaplacianSmoother::~LaplacianSmoother() 
00047 { }    
00048 
00049 void LaplacianSmoother::optimize_vertex_positions( PatchData &pd, 
00050                                                    MsqError &err )
00051 {
00052   assert(pd.num_free_vertices() == 1);
00053   const size_t center_vtx_index = 0;
00054   
00055   adjVtxList.clear();
00056   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices( center_vtx_index, adjVtxList, err );
00057   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00058   
00059   if (adjVtxList.empty())
00060     return;
00061   
00062   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00063   const size_t n = adjVtxList.size();
00064   
00065   Vector3D new_pos = verts[ adjVtxList[0] ];
00066   for (size_t i = 1; i < n; ++i)
00067     new_pos += verts[ adjVtxList[i] ];
00068   new_pos *= 1.0/n;
00069   pd.set_vertex_coordinates( new_pos, center_vtx_index, err );
00070   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain( center_vtx_index, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00071 }
00072 
00073 } // namespace Mesquite
